question:
Consider the following statements about the Impacting Research Innovation and Technology Fund (IMPRINT-II):
  1. It is a fund approved by the World Bank
  2. The fund aims to boost research and innovation in engineering institutions of India
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. IMPRINT-II is a fund created by the Ministry of Science & Technology and Ministry of Human Resource Development together. It involves participation from industry and other interested ministries. Earlier to this, IMPRINT-I fund was established, under which 142 projects at a cost of Rs 318.71 crore are being implemented. <u>Second statement is correct</u> because the fund aims to enhance the quality of engineering education in India. It aims at developing new engineering education policy and creating a roadmap to pursue engineering challenges. It includes technological advancements in crucial domains like security, defence, information technology, energy, nano-technology and climate change. In order to boost research and innovation in the country, the government recently sanctioned Rs. 1000 for the second phase of IMPRINT India programme.
